entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
